name: Comparum
overview:
Price comparison for UK online shops,

The comparum pricewatcher is operative in 7 west european countries, our catalogue covers all mayor shopping categories, and every category contains almost every product sold at the european online market. In the broad range of products you can find easily the online shop which offers the best price or which has the best shopping conditions at the moment. The website is very user-friendly and has only three levels to find a product with the best offers. To ensure the completeness of online shops and products Comparum works with third companies who are gathering all the information from online retailers. To get the latest price drops and the best offers on the internet, prices from online shops are updated twice a day.

Comparum is independed therefore online shops cannot pay to get a better position on the website. Prices are including taxes, but delivery costs are shown seperately. If you have certain experiences with a shop are a product we invite you to write a good review, for future buyers. Remind that the lowest price is not always the best buy, therefore reviews are necessary to get others informed before they go over to a purchase. Tip: Try also to search in neighbour countries, sometimes it is worth it to purchase from a another country because of huge price differences, and even save more!
